alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 24 at 1:41PM MDT until October 26 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO 3 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches in the lower elevations like Bone, Soda Springs, Wayan, and Grace. 6 to 15 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes in the Bear River Range and the Big Holes. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Bear River Range, Blackfoot Mountains, Caribou Range and the Big Hole Mountains * WHEN...From midnight Wednesday night to 3 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times, especially over Galena Summit. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range
